import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./styles.css"; // Import images import dsImage from "./assets/What-is-data-science-2.jpg"; import aimlImage from "./assets/aiml-image-1.webp"; import cyberImage from "./assets/cyber-image.png"; import bbaImage from "./assets/images-bba.jpg"; import heroBackground from "./assets/hero-bg.jpg"; import aboutImage from "./assets/about-image.jpg"; // Font Awesome for icons (install with: npm install @fortawesome/react-fontawesome @fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons) import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faFacebook, faTwitter, faLinkedin, faInstagram } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; const HomePage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [animate, setAnimate] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setAnimate(true); }, []); const specializations = [ { name: "Data Science", image: dsImage, path: "/alumni/datascience" }, { name: "AI / ML", image: aimlImage, path: "/alumni/aiml" }, { name: "Cybersecurity", image: cyberImage, path: "/alumni/cyber" }, { name: "BBA", image: bbaImage, path: "/alumni/bba" }, ]; const features = [ { icon: "ðŸ‘¥", title: "Network", description: "Connect with professionals in your field of study" }, { icon: "ðŸŽ“", title: "Mentorship", description: "Get guidance from experienced alumni" }, { icon: "ðŸ’¼", title: "Opportunities", description: "Discover internships and job openings" }, ]; return (

About Alumni Edge

Our platform bridges the gap between current students and successful alumni. Whether you're working on projects, looking for mentorship, or exploring career paths, Alumni Edge connects you with graduates who've been in your shoes.

); }; export default HomePage;
